body: this author cant do happy endings.. sad

They are sex friends promised not to kiss each other and only have sex because she knows he likes the other girl. But it seems like he falls for her after all but she is still going aboard. This meeting is their last meeting before that.
Edogawa Roman's art is deliciously good. Hope this gets TL'd as well.
